storyInfo: Arctosz and Leto acknowledge their ties in the snow. Degenbrecher's appearance confirms the Trilby Asher's conjecture, and he decides to make a run for the island. She has no plans to let him do as he pleases, and a chase sequence begins.

attributes.text: <color=#000000>We don't want to play with her, she's a freak without a papa!</color>
<color=#000000>Hahaha, Rosalind's a rotten girl without a papa!</color>

attributes.content: I'm not a rotten girl!
I-I won't let you call me that...!

attributes.text: <color=#000000>Yow! Sh-She hit us first! See, she's a bad kid!</color>

attributes.content: If you wanna fight, you'll get one! I'm not scared of you!
I'm not a bad kid!
I'm fine with just my mamochka, I don't need a papa!
I don't need a...
Hah...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Didn't expect I'd fall headfirst into them.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The trees... they were here all along.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Two trees growing into each other, this has to be them.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Okay, that should do it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Now that mom's business is done, I'll...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Nope, can't climb back up.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The snow's too thick, and the hill's too steep to make it back up with my bare hands.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: There's only this cliff here left to try...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: W-Wait, Rosalind!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Get away from there, it's dangerous!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Okay, okay, I'm getting away! You stay put too!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You can't move your legs, right? Just take a rest and don't push yourself.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Just a scratch. Not like I'd ever let you fall.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Those Victorian bastards actually dragged you into their plans... I won't let them get away with it!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So that guy's really a Victorian spy?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: He, well... he didn't actually do anything to me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It'll be too late when he does!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'd have beat him so badly he wouldn't dare to set foot on Paleroche land ever again, if only we didn't have such bad luck!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Before you came out of nowhere, I was about to tie the bastard up and teach him a lesson!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Whatever, let's just drop it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Back there, you...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ugh, I hate it when people take their sweet time beating around the bush, so I'll just ask!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So, why did you move to protect me when we fell?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And that Victorian guy, what was he talking about? Something to do with who somebody is?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I know you might find what I'm about to say hard to accept, but...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Tatyana and I—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Your mother and I met on the summit of this mountain.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You... and mamochka... you mean, you're...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, you're my daughter.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: A most unusual guest.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What business has you hurrying over here today, Ratatos?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You must know exactly what it is, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Are you sure we can fool that Victorian Trilby Asher with our bait?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The smarter a man is, the more confident he is in his own judgement, correct?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's for sure.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But Enciodes, here's a warning for you too. Don't underestimate people.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: That Victorian spy seems to be pretty misled. He's chasing Arctosz's daughter all right, but I don't think things are gonna keep going that smoothly.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What if he doesn't go according to your plans? How are you gonna handle that?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You must have some sort of backup plan?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Arctosz's daughter deciding to return to Kjerag now is indeed outside the scope of our plans.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course, I couldn't possibly think such an improvised plan would suffice to solve our problem.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It sounds like you have something up your sleeve.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Let me see... why haven't I seen Gnosis today?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And the bodyguard always at your side. I heard from my sister and brother-in-law she hasn't been helping you train your Tschäggättä recently.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You get your information fast, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis and Degenbrecher naturally have their own jobs to do, and if you're here to see them today, I'm afraid you'll have to leave disappointed.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm not looking for them.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Although... ah, yes. I had a piece of 'good news' for Gnosis, if he was here.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Nothing major, you'll know all about it tomorrow.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He's said this before, but I'll personally remind you, Enciodes. You'd better be certain of the things happening below Kjeragandr's statue...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's not just about one Clan Silverash. You'd do well to remember that us Browntails also have a stake in it!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's etched into my mind.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Whether it be the tri-clans or the Vine-Bead Court led by the Saintess...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ratatos, you should hold a little more confidence.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Whether it be in you, me, Gnosis, or even Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All that we do here is for Kjerag's future.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That is my firm belief.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Run enough laps yet?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Also, I must retrieve my words from earlier, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What's come into your clever little mind now?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The Black Knight indeed does not lie.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: A brazen misunderstanding on my part.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I thought young Larina was the key to the plans unfolding in Kjerag...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Were it not for that, I wouldn't have the slightest intention of establishing contact, and yet so many clues have appeared...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Madam, you did not come to block me from approaching Arctosz or Rosalind.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You're here to deepen the misunderstanding, yes?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Done talking?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Smart people always talk so much. I don't get why. I can't be bothered.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Now, pick up your weapon.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Let me see how sharp Victoria's claws are.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: No, no, no.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I surrender.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Is there a need for us to fight? This is a complete misunderstanding.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You were right, I should head down the mountain for lunch.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Trilby Asher calmly raises his hands and walks past Degenbrecher.
But as his back faces hers, he suddenly stops moving.
However...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is only a little guess of mine, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: To the best of my knowledge, Enciodes is not one to act without purpose.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If Madam Larina is truly uninvolved, I believe he wouldn't use her as bait.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: She is certainly not suspicious. So, could it be the Paleroche clan behind her?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Could it be... there's something amiss with the Paleroche spirits, or rather, the transport route they arranged for the alcohol?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Madam Larina's appearance was an unexpected affair.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And it is precisely because of that, you worry that once I meet her, I might just stumble upon Clan Paleroche in the course of my investigation and discover something I shouldn't have.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is why you've performed an entire show for me.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Degenbrecher does not answer, and merely raises her weapons, slowly.
The Paleroches are in charge of transporting various resources for Kjerag.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And all transport railways in the country converge on the same spot, Lake Silberneherze. To elaborate, what's important is... the island in the middle of the lake underneath the Kjeragandr statue.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Perhaps there are some secrets hidden there.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Would an intelligence officer divulge his own answers?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Everyone has their own strengths. For example, you'd be stronger than most of Victoria. However—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You cannot control the subtle expressions you're not even aware you're making.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I believe my guess is correct.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Degenbrecher wields her weapons with no mercy in mind, but the Trilby Asher is one step ahead of her.
He dodges the blast waves, the snow flying everywhere, and her murderous intent as he leaps down the mountain.
Degenbrecher gives chase.
The burdenbeast observation car is about to depart for Lake Silberneherze.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Our professionally trained burdenbeasts can bring you to every scenic spot and all the best views!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Travelers who want to enjoy spectacular vistas to on the way to the lake, don't miss this chance!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: I need to head over to Lake Silberneherze. Give me your fastest burdenbeast.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You'll have to pay extra for that, sir.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Name your price. I'm currently being hunted by a sinister woman, so do me a favor, friend.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If someone asks where I went, just tell them you don't know. Alright?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I've seen something like this before, on those discs my daughter sent me.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: (Whistle)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: That's the one. Fastest girl I got, Takme.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: And don't worry, sir. My lips are sealed.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Many thanks.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Trilby Asher nimbly jumps into the seat on the burdenbeast's back.
The beast begins to move, and breaks into a run towards the lake.
Pfft. Foreigners are so funny. I'll have to tell my girl about this when she comes back.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Have you seen a foreigner dressed in a black coat?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's really happening! Sorry, I didn't—
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Eh? Madam Degenbrecher?
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: You know me?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't you remember, when my Takme got stuck in a quagmire while transporting goods last year? You happened to be passing by and pulled her out!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Oh, right. That happened.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: So, you didn't see anyone, right? Then—
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That bastard actually called you sinister, and I even let him borrow Takme!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: I'm going to teach him a lesson for sure!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: He picks up a transceiver.
Takme! Stop, that's a bad guy!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Phew. A burdenbeast's adaptability is not to be underestimated, but the crucial trait is its robust endurance.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Perhaps it could serve as a strategic resource—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The burdenbeast underneath him suddenly turns restless with impatience.
Madam Degenbrecher, Takme's over here!
attributes.name: Burdenbeast Renter

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Gah—Have I been caught?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Bloody—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Grr—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Give up already. I'll be watching whatever it is you're up to today.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Even if my only desire is to see the local sights?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I know Kjerag pretty well.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I can't be doing this.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm definitely learning how to ice-skate today.
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: You've been saying that for a month already, and summer's already on its way.
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: You'll have to wait for a long, long time for the lake to freeze over.
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: And that's why I'll definitely get it down today!
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: Okay, okay, okay.
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: Sorry, I need to borrow these for a bit.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hey, my skates!
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: Here's some money for a new pair.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: During his thorough investigation of Kjerag, the Trilby Asher has seen many locals skating on the ice underneath the warm winter sun.
He's thought that an activity like this could be somewhat enjoyable, and has wanted to try it, if he had the time.
An opportunity has unexpectedly presented itself to him.
But soon, he discovers he has made a gross misjudgment—
Oh, um—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I thought you knew how to skate, man.
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: He's obviously new, so unstable.
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: Stable? Oh, I see.
attributes.name: Fallen 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Gah, sod it.
attributes.name: Fallen 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Move.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: Whoaaaaa! Someone's flying in from up high!
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: Stability, balance, right, yes, I've got it!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: With a loud bang, Degenbrecher's attack smashes a gigantic hole into the icy surface.
The Trilby Asher dodges the blow in the nick of time.
Wow, I got it down!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: How delightful. I'll definitely promote this sport after I return home!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Of course, I have to survive the day first.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: H-H-He, he actually learned how to skate!
attributes.name: Lively Local

attributes.content: I've never seen someone get it down that quickly...
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: Hmph. Is there a spare pair around?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ah, why don't I, lend you mine?
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Do you...
attributes.name: Calm Local

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: So fast!
attributes.name: Calm Local
